teachers.name: Sydney Reed
teachers.experience: My name is Sidney, I have been teaching clarinet privately for over 5 years.  I have also helped local school districts during contest season to help them prepare.

teachers.name: Frank Foster
teachers.experience: I have extensive experience in teaching and performing percussion at all levels of mastery.  I can teach marching percussion, drumset, percussion ensemble, solo literature, steel band, beginning percussion, and world percussion.

teachers.name: Charlene Ives
teachers.experience: I am a first year teacher looking to share my knowledge and experience.  While student teaching, I gained valuable experience assisting my mentor program.  I was fortunate enough to teach the beginning trumpet class and conduct the 3rd Concert Band at Spring Contest.

teachers.name: Freddie DaFreeloader
teachers.experience: I am mainly looking for a jazz gig. I don't like teaching marching band.

teachers.name: Marcia Pantera
teachers.experience: My name is Marcia, and I have a passion for performing and teaching guitar.  I love the feeling of playing duets with my students.  I am always in awe of their musicianship and technical abilities.

teachers.name: Natalie Flamtaps
teachers.experience: My name is Natalie, I have been teaching all levels of percussion for the past 21 years.  When it comes to music education, I able to bring my wealth of knowledge and experiece, which I gained attending Juliard and performing in the New World Symphony.
